remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會提供存取至資料保護 API (DPAPI) 可在 Windows XP 和更新版本的作業系統。This class provides access to the Data Protection API (DPAPI) available in the Windows XP and later operating systems. 這是由作業系統提供，而且不需要額外的程式庫的服務。This is a service that is provided by the operating system and does not require additional libraries. 它提供在記憶體中的機密資料加密。It provides encryption for sensitive data in memory. 類別包含兩個的包裝函式的未受管理的 DPAPI，和。The class consists of two wrappers for the unmanaged DPAPI, and . 這兩種方法可以用來加密和解密記憶體中的資料。These two methods can be used to encrypt and decrypt data in memory. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用資料保護。The following example shows how to use data protection.
